title: Exquisite Kundan Jadau Haaram with Emerald Accents
features: This magnificent Haaram showcases intricate Kundan Jadau craftsmanship, a hallmark of Hyderabadi jewelry. The design features floral motifs adorned with emeralds and diamonds, set within a meticulously crafted gold framework. Pink Coral beads and Blue Sapphire drops add a touch of color and elegance. The central pendant is a statement piece, echoing the floral theme and featuring a larger emerald. The overall setting uses the 'Jadau' technique where stones are embedded within gold foil.
description: This Kundan Jadau Haaram is a timeless masterpiece, representing the rich heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry making. The exquisite craftsmanship, combined with high-quality materials and the vibrant color palette, makes it a statement piece that will be cherished for generations. The use of Emeralds, Coral, and Sapphires holds traditional significance, symbolizing prosperity, health, and good fortune. Its durability ensures it can be enjoyed for years to come.
